page.title: 01PENICUIK
page.content: This 4*3squared km block stretches from{Silverburn}in the{SW}to the countryside in the{Glencorse}area in the{NE.}It includes the hillside areas of{Carnethy,Turnhouse}and {Lawhead } Hills, and about three quarters of the town of Penicuik itself . Diagonally across the area is the{A702 road from{Edinburgh},which is approximately eight and a half miles from the NE corner of the block,to {Carlops},which is about three and a half miles from the SW corner. Nowadays Penicuik is mainly a residential area from which its population travel to Edinburgh to work. The two new housing estates in the block are{Cornbank}and {Mauricewood}.There is one High School.
